name: Neutral Corner
overview: A boxing game for 0 to 2 simultaneous players, released as Megabox in Go Games n.13 (October 1986). A boxing match where you fight against a champion guided by the computer or against a second participant. I want a good, clean fight so touch globes and go back to your corners and when the bell rings come out swinging. Published as Megabox in Italy in Go Games n.13 (Ottobre 1986).
